Description: 
-------------- 
In Jillian Michaels Fitness' Ultimatum 2010, players enter a week of hell camp-style boot full of new features and modes of energy training that fully leverages the capabilities of motion of the Wii Remote and the Wii Balance Board. Under the guidance of expert Jillian Michaels', players participate in the lively one-on-one training sessions with all-new core workout cardio training, strength training and balance training superset routines. 

The game has many new ways, including "Fitness Resolutions" and "Exercise with Jillian." In "Fitness Resolutions, players plan their routines for the next six months by creating a training schedule, while" Jillian exercise "gives players one-on-one with a 3D avatar Jillian Michaels routines showing pre-made or custom. Moreover, the main motion tracking improvements allow more precise movements and precise exercises to ensure proper tempo and technique. The players adapt their training to their specific skills, adjusting the difficulty level of the game and ensure a safe period of warming and cooling periods. For even more variety, players can work out in exotic locations such as beaches and forests, or challenge family and friends in multiplayer competitions.
